1. When you see "Connected!" in notifications, you will get them, but once it is gone, no more notifications.\n 2. Only the latest 5 notices will be visible\n 3. Once uploaded or posted, you cannot delete the post there after.

1. Our payment structure is dynamic, tailored to individual service usage. This flexibility ensures fairness and personalization in each transaction, aligning with the unique needs of our users.


2. Emphasizing your security, we employ robust encryption methods to protect your payment details. Our secure processing ensures that your financial information remains confidential and shielded from unauthorized access.


3. Guaranteeing transparency, our transactions provide a clear breakdown of charges. This commitment allows users to comprehend and verify each expense, fostering trust and understanding in our payment processes.


4. It is essential to note that we do not have a refund policy in place. Customers should be aware that once a transaction is completed, it is considered final, and no refunds will be issued.


5. Privacy Protection: Our commitment to privacy extends beyond transactions. Adhering to stringent data protection standards, we prioritize safeguarding your personal information, ensuring it remains confidential and protected within our secure systems.


6. We want to inform our users that we do not provide payment confirmations. While our transactions proceed smoothly, customers should be aware that we do not offer explicit confirmations for completed payments.

 7. More the User, Less the Amount: As a reward for increased usage, our pricing model reflects a user-friendly approach. The more our users engage with our services, the more cost-effective their transactions become.

Effective Date: 20-07-2024

Unofficial Mech is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application, Unofficial Mech. 

 1. Information We Collect
 We collect two types of information through the App: 

 - Personal Information: This information identifies you as an individual and may include:
 • Usage data: information about your interaction with the App, such as features used, browsing history, and crash logs.
 • Account information: username, password (hashed and salted), and profile information.
 - Non-Personal Information: This information does not identify you as an individual and may include:
 • Aggregated data: derived from your Personal Information and anonymized so it does not identify any specific user.
 • Log data: information automatically collected when you use the App, such as access times, pages viewed, and referring URLs.
 

 2. How We Collect Information
 We collect information through various methods when you use the App:
 • Directly from You: You may provide Personal Information when you create an account, use certain features, or contact us for support.
 • Automatically: We collect information automatically through the Apps technology, including cookies and similar tracking technologies.
 

 3. How We Use Your Information
 We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
 • Provide and improve the App: We use your information to operate, maintain, and improve the App, personalize your experience, and develop new features.
 • Analyze Usage: We use your information to analyze how users interact with the App, identify trends, and improve its functionality.
 • Communicate with You: We may use your information to communicate with you about the App, including sending service announcements, promotional offers, and responding to your inquiries.
 • Security and Fraud Prevention: We use your information to protect the App from unauthorized access, misuse, and fraud.
 

 4. Sharing Your Information
 We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate and improve the App. These providers may be located in different countries and jurisdictions. We will only share your information with providers who have agreed to comply with strict data privacy and security standards.
 Here are the categories of third-party service providers we may share your information with: 
 • Hosting Providers: We store your information on servers provided by third-party hosting companies.
 • Analytics Providers: We use third-party analytics services to understand how users interact with the App and improve its performance.
 • Payment Processors: We may use third-party payment processors if the App offers in-app purchases or subscriptions.
 • We will never sell or rent your Personal Information to third-party marketers without your explicit consent. However, we may share your Aggregated Data or Non-Personal Information with third parties for various purposes, such as market research or advertising.
 

 5. Your Choices
 You have certain choices regarding your information:
 • Account Information: You can access and update your account information through the App settings.
 • Location Services: You may be able to control whether the App accesses your location information through your device settings.
 • Push Notifications: You can opt-out of receiving push notifications through the App settings.
 • Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Most web browsers allow you to control or disable cookies and similar tracking technologies. You can adjust your browser settings to manage your preferences.
 

 6. Data Retention
 We will retain your Personal Information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. 

 7. Security
 We take reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no internet or electronic storage system is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the security of your information. 

 8. Children Privacy
 The App is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with Personal Information, please contact us. We will delete any Personal Information collected from a child under 13 upon verification. 

 9. International Transfers
 Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws than your own.

1. Acceptance of Terms
 By downloading, installing, or using the Unofficial Mech mobile application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you will be not able to use the app. 

 2. Use of the App
 2.1. You must be at least 18 years old to use the App.
 2.2. You are responsible for any activity that occurs under your App account.
 2.3. You agree not to engage in any unlawful or prohibited activities while using the app.
 
 3. Privacy
 3.1. Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy.
 3.2. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in the Privacy Policy.
 
 4. Intellectual Property
 4.1. The App and its content are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
 4.2. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on the App without our explicit permission
 
 5. User Content
 5.1. You may submit content, including text, images, and comments, through the App.
 
 6. Updates and Changes
 6.1. We may update , modify, or discontinue the App at any time without notice.
 6.2. We reserve the right to change these Terms and Conditions at our discretions.
 
 7. Disclaimer
 7.1. The App is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied.
 7.2. We do not guarantee the accuracy, but we do guarantee the availability and the content in the App.
 
 8. Limitation of Liability
 8.1. We are not liable for any damages or losse arising from your use of the App.
 
 9. Termination\m We reserve the right to terminate your access to the App at any time for any reason.
 
 10. Contact Information
 If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions,please contact us at: om.lokhande34@gmail.com
 
 With effect as of 5th September 2023

Unofficial Mech - Your College Memories Hub


Welcome to Unofficial Mech, the ultimate social media platform exclusively for college students. Our app is your personal space to relieve and cherish your college memories , stay connected with your college community, and access essential campus updates in real-time.


Major Feature:


• College Memories: Capture and share your college journey with ease. Upload photos, videos, and stories that reflect unforgettable moments, whether its that epic graduation ceremony or the impromtu late-night study sessions.
 
 • Memory Storage: Safeguard your cherished memories. Our app provides secure cloud storage to ensure your college adventures are preserved for a lifetime.
 
 • Notice board: Stay informed about campus news and events with our integrated notice board. Receive realtime updates on class schedules, campus events, and important announcements directly from college faculty.
 
 • Faculty Status: Wondering if professor is available for a quick chat? Check the realtime faculty status feature to see their availability and office hours.
 
 • Campus Community: Connect with fellow students, alumni, and faculty members. Join or create groups dedicated to your major, interests, or extracyrricular ativities.
 

Third-Party Services
 This app utilizes various third-party services including Firebase, MDC, Google AI, Picasso and Google Vision in accordance with their respective terms of service.


Privacy
 Your privacy is important to us. This app only functions in the background to enable features like notifications. We do not collect any user data in the background. To learn more about our data practices, please refer to our Privacy Policy.


App Features
 Secure Community Discussions: Engage in discussions with the community where your posts are not visible to faculty members. This fosters a safe space for open and honest communication.


Our Vision:
 At Unofficial Mech, we believe that college is a journey filled with unique experiences and friendships that last a lifetime. Our mission is to provide a dedicated platform where college students can celebrate these moments, connect with their peers, and stay informed about campus life.


This app is developed by Om Lokhande with support of Aishwarya Kumbhar (CR) from B.TECH (B) Mechanical Department


*2021 - 2025 Batch

Changelog:
 • Introducing Gemini Flash Latest
 • NEW! Search friends
 • NEW! Virtual ID
 • NEW! My Profile
 • NEW! Dark Mode (System default)
 • NEW! Activities
 • NEW! ION Student App 
 • NEW! Superset
 • NEW! ERP
 • NEW! Profile Views
 • NEW! Gemini Flash Latest
 • NEW! FAQs
 • Added new layer of Security
 • Invite faculties!
 • Supports swipe feature between tabs
 • Attendance Tracker (Deprecated)
 • Enhanced smooth experience
 • Stable update
 • Fixed Faculty UI
 • Fixed minor bugs

• Respect the privacy of the other users and avoid sharing personal information without consent
 • Refrain from posting false or misleading information that could harm the community
 • Avoid spamming the app with irrelevant or promotional content.
 • Report to any violation of guidelines to maintain a safe and positive app environment.
 • Misleading notices and inappropriate posts will lead to account suspension
 • Adding your personal photos in the album is strictly restricted.
